com.example.android.funkytasks

Class SearchListViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Task>
        • com.example.android.funkytasks.SearchListViewAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class SearchListViewAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Task>
    This adapter displays the tasks provided by the search function.

      • getLowestBid

        public static Bid getLowestBid(java.util.ArrayList<Bid> bidsList)
        Returns the lowest bid, if any, that is currently placed on a task
        Parameters:
        bidsList - an array list that holds all the bids that were returned by the search
        Returns:
        a double representing the lowest bid on the task
